attributes.additional_details: Remove sudan from red to amber and dont but country in green dont leave people whitout condition if they dont have 2 does
attributes.background: Chang sudan to amber and dont leave country in green whitout 2 dose

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We don't know what you mean by "dont but country in green dont leave people whitout condition if they dont have 2 does"

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.  You'll need to use your full name and not just a first name if you do start a new petition.
